contents_1: Take a tour of U.S. history when you visit Pearl Harbor, the largest natural harbor in Hawaii and the number one visitor destination on Oahu.
description: Take a tour of U.S. history when you visit Pearl Harbor, the largest natural harbor in Hawaii and the number one visitor destination on Oahu. You’ll learn about the fascinating history of the politics, people, and events that started World War II. The Aqua Waikiki Pearl will be happy to help you to book your tour.
